overview_of_class: This is the second course of a two-quarter sequence in Econometrics. Topics covered include time series, applied regression and instrumental variable analysis, discrete dependent variables, panel data, and treatment effect methods. Prerequisite: second-year standing in MMSS.
name: Econometrics for MMSS
title: WCAS MATH 386-2-51 Econometrics for MMSS
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Math Methods in Social Sciences Students only

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is the second course of a two-quarter sequence in Econometrics. Topics covered include time series, applied regression and instrumental variable analysis, discrete dependent variables, panel data, and treatment effect methods. Prerequisite: second-year standing in MMSS.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: Students may not receive credit for both 337 and 386.

subject: MATH
